body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Review document here: Hagerman Fossil Beds Foundation Document (63 KB) Comment on document here: http://goo.gl/forms/VsyEZNgkGg Northern Rocky Mountain Invasive Plant Management Plan (1.2 MB) Pacific West Region Museum Management Plan (3.1 MB)      Monument Purpose The purpose of Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument is as follows: · To preserve for the benefit and enjoyment of present and future generations the outstanding paleontological sites · To provide a center for continuing paleontological research · To provide for the display and interpretation of the scientific specimens uncovered at the fossil sites · To provide for the orderly and regulated use of and research in the monument by qualified scientists, scientific groups, and students under the jurisdiction of such qualified individuals and groups            Rangers work at the famous Hagerman Horse Quarry uncovering Equus simplicidens horse fossils. NPS
title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Management
